title: Weight and Mass Converter (kg, lb, N, oz, stone)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: weight (N) = mass (kg) × g g = 9.80665 m/s² (standard) mass (kg) = weight (N) ÷ g 1 lb = 0.45359237 kg, 1 oz = 0.028349523125 kg, 1 stone = 6.35029318 kg
